title: Easy Returns
rules: 30-day return policy for most categories. 7-day return for mobile phones and electronics. Items must be unused and in original packaging. Free pickup for returns above ₹500.

title: Product Replacement
rules: Free replacement for manufacturing defects within return period. Same model replacement preferred. If unavailable, refund processed. Replacement pickup scheduled within 2-3 days.

title: Refund Policy
rules: Refunds processed within 7-14 business days. Credit/debit card refunds: 7-10 days. Net banking: 7-14 days. Flipkart Gift Card refunds: instant. Cancellation refunds: 1-2 days.

title: Shipping Policy
rules: Free shipping on orders above ₹500. Standard delivery: 2-6 business days. Express delivery available in select cities. Cash on Delivery available. Installation services for appliances.

title: Cash on Delivery
rules: COD available on orders up to ₹50,000. Additional ₹25 COD charge on orders below ₹500. Exact change preferred. Digital payment encouraged. COD verification may be required.

title: Flipkart Plus
rules: Earn Plus Coins on every purchase. Free delivery with no minimum order value. Early access to sales. Plus Zone products with special pricing. Priority customer support.

title: Flipkart Grocery
rules: Fresh groceries delivered in 2-6 hours. Minimum order ₹99. Express delivery available. Substitutions made for out-of-stock items. Quality guarantee on fresh products.

title: Fashion Returns
description: Special return policy for fashion items
rules: Fashion items: 10-day return/exchange policy. Size exchange available. Fashion must be unworn with tags intact. Try & Buy available for select items. Quality issues: full refund.

title: Mobile Exchange
rules: Exchange old mobile for discount on new purchase. Device evaluation done by expert. Exchange value depends on device condition. Data backup and wiping assistance provided.

title: Extended Warranty
rules: 1-3 year extended warranty plans available. Covers manufacturing defects after manufacturer warranty. On-site service for appliances. Accidental damage protection available.

title: No Cost EMI
rules: 0% interest EMI available on credit cards and Bajaj Finserv. 3-24 month EMI options. Processing fee may apply. Credit approval required. Foreclosure allowed.

title: Order Cancellation
rules: Orders can be cancelled before dispatch. Refund processed immediately for prepaid orders. COD orders: no refund needed. Partial cancellation allowed for multi-item orders.

title: Big Billion Days
rules: Special sale prices valid during event period only. Limited quantity deals. Price changes without notice. Sale prices cannot be combined with other offers. Flash sales: first come first served.

title: Seller Protection
rules: Sellers must maintain 4+ star rating. Late delivery penalties apply. Product quality standards enforced. Customer service response time: 24 hours. Seller protection against false claims.

title: Flipkart Assured
rules: Assured products meet Flipkart quality standards. Faster delivery guarantee. Enhanced customer support. Quality checked before dispatch. Higher return priority.

title: Books Policy
rules: Books non-returnable after 10 days. Academic books: semester-long return policy. E-books: no return after download. Book condition clearly mentioned. International editions clearly marked.

title: Health+ Pharmacy
rules: Valid prescription required for medicines. Age verification for certain products. Licensed pharmacist consultation available. Medicine returns only for damaged/wrong items. Cold chain maintained.

title: Furniture Delivery
rules: Furniture installation service available. Delivery coordination call made. Ground floor delivery standard. Additional charges for elevator/stairs. Assembly instructions provided.

title: Travel Bookings
rules: Flight/hotel booking cancellation as per provider terms. Travel insurance available. Customer support for booking issues. Refund processing: 7-21 business days depending on provider.

title: Gift Cards
rules: Gift cards valid for 1 year from issue. Can be used for most products except gold/travel. Partial redemption allowed. Cannot be transferred or resold. No cash refund available.
